general.title: General Information
general.description: I am a software developer in training with hands-on experience in web and mobile application development. I specialize in programming, computational logic, and personalized teaching. I am passionate about technology and enjoy sharing knowledge with students of all levels, from high school to university. I am seeking opportunities to work as a technology, computer science, or programming teacher, contributing my real-world project experience and vocation as an educator.

skills.description: Main technical and personal skills acquired through my training and experience.

educationDescription: University and high school academic background, focused on software development, critical thinking, and teamwork.

details: Training in the development of modern applications and systems tailored to real user and organizational needs.
Collaborative teamwork with a focus on agile methodologies and best development practices.
Active participation in academic projects focused on solving problems through creative digital solutions.
Development of critical thinking and analytical skills for decision-making in technological environments.

educationItems.institution: Juan León Mera 'La Salle' Educational Unit

certificationsItems.name: Ecuadorian Sign Language
certificationsItems.description: Certificate of completion of the Ecuadorian Sign Language course.

certificationsDescription: Certificates and achievements obtained during my professional training.
descriptionLanguage: Languages I speak and my estimated proficiency level.

workExperienceItems.description: Personalized tutoring for high school and university students in mathematics, physics, chemistry, basic programming, and logic. Development of teaching materials and practical exercises. Focus on active learning and computational thinking.
Development of a cross-platform app with Flutter and Firebase to improve order flow between dining room and kitchen. Participation in key interface and real-time communication features.
Led the development of a web system to view tourist destinations and connect with advisors via WhatsApp API. Implementation of purchase flow and direct contact.
Team coordination and functional design of an app to share information about missing persons and community support.

workExperienceItems.company: GITT System – Technical University of Ambato
workExperienceItems.description: Lead the design and operation of the visual part of a digital solution for academic inventory and loan management. Team coordination, functional design, and user experience.

experienceDescription: Practical experience in software development, tutoring, project leadership, and teamwork.
contactsDescription: Main contact information: city, phone, email, and LinkedIn for professional or academic inquiries.
